description: Soon on his way to join the Police Academy, Mathias is eager to show buddy Ryan Jordan all the ways he has of controlling another man, and Ryan finds Mathias unwarranted use of force to be downright sexy. Hopefully, the mean streets will be just as easy to win over as Ryan, but in the meantime, Mathias is looking to take advantage of this cooperative citizen, and he'll be searching deep and hard until he finds what he's looking for. As for Ryan, well he's just always wanted to fuck a cop, and he figures a cop-in-training is a good start.Enjoy!
title: Bend & Spread
